name: Molly Wop (XXXTenTesticles)
description:
MOLLY WOP is a fast-paced, first person, endless score-based beat 'em up.

Swap hands, dodge blows and stack bodies to earn your title as WORLD STAR!

***TIPS****

Best played in Full Screen

WINNERS DON'T MASH BUTTONS - each strike needs to be deliberate and accurate to be effective

Be fast and hard to it - When you see an enemy winding up, that's your que to move!

Exceed 4 stars to earn the title of World Star! If you accomplish this, let me know in the comments!!

**** CONTROLS ****

Left Click - Left Punch

Right Click- Right Punch

W-A-S-D to move
